snippet: All presidential campaigns have bad weeks, and when they come in early June, it is hardly a disaster. But it is also important for campaigns to clean things up after they have gotten a bit messy.
abstract: All presidential campaigns have bad weeks, and when they come in early June, it is hardly a disaster. But it is also important for campaigns to clean things up after they have gotten a bit messy.

headline.main: Obama Campaign Seeks to Move On After Tough Week
headline.print_headline: Obama Campaign Seeks to Move On After Tough Week
